thread.title: Labrador owner
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Labrador owner

author: Labrador owner
title: Labrador owner
text: Had this coverage for the past seven years. Never needed to use it until our Labrador injured her knee (CCL) and needed surgery. No issues and claim payment was adherent to policy. Customer service demonstrates care and concern. Thank you!
